attributes.name: [PostgreSQL] Buffer Cache Hit Ratio above threshold

esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for Buffer cache hit ratio is < 90, and the alerting rule is grouped by database name and host name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the cache_hit_ratio value in the WHERE clause.
 FROM metrics-postgresql.statement-default
| STATS total_hits=SUM(postgresql.database.blocks.hit), total_reads=SUM(postgresql.database.blocks.read) BY postgresql.database.name, host.name
| EVAL total_blocks = total_hits + total_reads
| EVAL cache_hit_ratio = CASE(total_blocks > 0, (total_hits / total_blocks) * 100, 0)
| WHERE cache_hit_ratio < 90
